prompts: Create a vibrant fish Pokemon with a mix of pink and yellow colors.
I want an aquatic creature that has a unique shape and bright patterns.
Generate a whimsical water-type Pokemon that stands out in any ocean.
Make a colorful sea Pokemon with a playful personality and bold features.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies both beauty and danger, with striking colors.
Design a fantastical fish Pokemon that captivates trainers with its charm.
Give me a Pokemon with an eye-catching appearance that lives in coral reefs.
